item.title: EV warranty startup Amber launches a remote diagnostic service for Teslas
item.description:
EV warranty startup Amber is expanding nationwide, bringing on new vehicles and offering a new remote diagnostic scan — all signs that the one-year-old company is putting its recent $3.18 million seed round to good use. The startup launched an aftermarket warranty product for Tesla vehicles called AmberCare — which is a suite of warranty […]

item.title: Amazon trials last-mile deliveries by tram in Frankfurt
item.description:
Amazon has announced a new pilot package delivery service in Frankfurt, Germany, that meshes electric road and rail transport. The e-commerce giant will use vans from its delivery depot to the first tram stop on the outskirts of Frankfurt, with the city’s new Gütertram service transporting the goods to awaiting cargo bikes. Gütertram constitutes part […]

item.title: Volkswagen scraps a slew of labor agreements as standoff with unions intensifies
item.description: German automotive giant Volkswagen on Tuesday said it was scrapping a slew of labor agreements.
